AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: animal friend
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: From early childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] was surrounded by wild animals that needed help and care. [PAWN_pronoun] sincerely cared about the unfortunate little animals, so next to [PAWN_objective] they often became affectionate and tame.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gifted by nature
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with great magical potential, as the forest spirit gave [PAWN_objective] blessing. [PAWN_pronoun] used innate abilities for the benefit of nature, protecting various representatives of flora and fauna, as well as maintaining the delicate balance of natural things.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tamed companion
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made friends with the big beast. [PAWN_pronoun] took care of the animal and fed it for a long time. In gratitude, the beast once saved [PAWN_possessive] from destruction.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lonely farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lost family and was left all alone. In order to feed {PAWN_gender ? himself : herself} and not starve to death, [PAWN_pronoun] devoted all free time to cultivating the land on the inherited farm.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: forest family
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a family of forest savages, far from the rest of civilization. [PAWN_pronoun] did not have the opportunity to adapt to modern society.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sacred Idol
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: When [PAWN_nameDef] was born, relatives immediately considered [PAWN_objective] a messenger of the gods. In [PAWN_possessive] native village, [PAWN_pronoun] was an object of worship and reverence.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: copycat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived surrounded by representatives of different races. [PAWN_pronoun] tried to please and to imitate them by building and putting homemade wings with horns.
